content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option priha was the official warm-up pattern of tour-de-sock 2 2017 --- **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 64 sts medium/large 72 sts and extra-large 80 sts - ribbed heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/b/y1zt 2 http //tour-de-sock com
